BookTitle: Don't Make Me Think: A Common Sense Approach to Web Usability (Voices That Matter)
Content: FACT OF LIFE #1: We don’t read pages. We scan them.

BookTitle: Don't Make Me Think: A Common Sense Approach to Web Usability (Voices That Matter)
Content: There are usually large parts of the page that they don’t even look at. We’re thinking “great literature” (or at least “product brochure”), while the user’s reality is much closer to “billboard going by at 60 miles an hour.”
